content: k1 sl1wyib k4 *k1 sl1wyib k3* twice round 30 p1 k1 p5 k1 p3 m1rp p1 k1 p3 102 119 136 sts round 31 *k1 sl1wyib k4* twice k1 sl1wyib k3 round 32 *p1 k1 p4* twice p1 k1 p3 m1rp 108 126 144 sts place a removable marker in round 32 5 round 33 *p1 sl1wyib k4* three times round 34 *sl1wyif k1 p4* three times repeat rounds 33 & 34 until you have reached 8 in / 20 3 cm or until desired length from marker bind off using the ez sewn bind off cut and weave in ends hand wash gently in cool water lay flat to dry and enjoy 6
